mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.weixiuxiangmu_order_uuid_number as weixiuxiangmuOrderUuidNumber ,a.weixiuxiangmu_id as weixiuxiangmuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.cheliang_id as cheliangId ,a.weixiuxiangmu_order_time as weixiuxiangmuOrderTime ,a.weixiuxiangmu_order_true_price as weixiuxiangmuOrderTruePrice ,a.weixiuxiangmu_order_types as weixiuxiangmuOrderTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
